posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase a T3 Turkey Red Tris Speaker in PSA 4, 4.5, or 5.  SGC or raw (vg-ex, ex) works fine too.

Pictures of front and back appreciated, thank you.

Hope you can help a fellow collector out!
Bump....willing to pay top dollar for those who might be on the fence...
Another bump.  Realize there's a finite number of these cards, but my money's burning a hole in my pocket.... :)

Friendly bump for a T3 Speaker...

Remember: the holidays are right around the corner.  Wouldn't some extra spending money be nice...?

December bump.  

Calling all nice T3 Speakers....
